Standing Outdoor Light Box
FOB Price: Get Latest Price Port: Shanghai Minimum Order Quantity: 10 Set/Sets Supply Ability: 50000 Set/Sets per Year Payment Terms: L/C,T/T Mr. Tom Young Unverified Company Signworld Inc [ United States ]
Contact Details View this Supplier's Website See larger image: Standing Outdoor Light Box Report Suspicious Activity Suspicious activities include posting prohibited/restricted item, fraud, etc. Add to My Favorites Online Showroom: 22 Products Similar Products from this Supplier Product Details Company Profile Quick Details Place of Origin: Shanghai China (Mainland) Brand Name: signworld Model Number: GNS01 Size: 48*134*26cm Material: aluminum frame Power Consumption: 220v or 110v ballast Packaging&Delivery Packaging Detail: 1 set/carton Delivery Detail: 20 days Specifications A sidewalk standing light box used to show your illuminated image. The two-sided design is to reach your costomer as if they wal
Standing light box is suitable for outdoor use, making it a great tool for attracting customers into stores or restaurants. This light box is also big enough that customers can be sure to see it.We ensure our light boxes illuminate your graphic image with the most even light distribution possible, bringing your graphics to life and creating powerful eye catching displays.
"Signworld", established in 1964, is aiming to integrate all kinds of display signage and create new products. At the same time, offering various related product information, from display light boxes, display cases, public space surrounding facilities to any other advertisement hardware.
View more >>
